title: Using an E-Reader to Answer a Question
question_text: Sophia loves to read and devours as many books as she can over summer vacation.  She especially likes best-selling novels, and has downloaded hundreds of these novels to her e-reader. A few years ago, Sophia noticed that her e-reader provides information about the average amount of time it takes to read a given novel.  Sophia decided that from then on, she would record how much time it takes for her to read each novel and then compare her time to the published average for that novel. Which of the following questions is Sophia most likely trying to answer?

choices.text: On average, does Sophia read more novels than other people?
On average, is Sophia able to read novels more quickly than the general population?
What it the average amount of time it takes Sophia to read a novel?
What is the average amount of time it takes all individuals to read a novel?
What is the average number of novels that Sophia reads each summer?
